DOC.brief_summary: The aim study examine effect fatty fish white ( lean ) fish cardiovascular disease risk factor level subject establish coronary heart disease use multiple medication . The main end point blood pressure , serum lipid , inflammatory marker , arrhythmias gene expression peripheral mononuclear cell . The study design control , parallel study last 8 week three diet group : fatty fish , white fish control group ( lean pork , beef chicken ) .
DOC.brief_title: Effects Fatty Lean Fish Intake Cardiovascular Risk Factors Subjects With Coronary Heart Disease
DOC.criteria: myocardial infarction unstable ischemic attack use beta blocker normal sinus rhythm fast serum triglyceride less equal 3.5 mmol/l fast serum cholesterol less equal 8 mmol/l BMI 18.530 kg/m2 fast plasma glucose less equal 7 mmol/l diabetes use antiarrhythmic medication beta blocker atrial fibrillation use psychotropic medication abnormal liver , thyroid kidney function inflammatory bowel disease excessive use alcohol use fish oil supplement high habitual intake fish
